title: 客户端崩溃
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1707240341 于 2020-5-8 14:59 编辑 

进服务器后合成东西客户端会崩溃，但单机玩不崩 
插件都都这些

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
合成的时候打开小绿书
或者尝试删除foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar

replies.author: 血盟团长
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 MikeW138 于 2020-5-8 11:02 编辑 

应该是插件冲突
WARNING: coremods are present:
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([1.12.2][R键整理]InventoryTweaks-1.64+dev.146.jar)
  ForgelinPlugin ([1.12.2][前置]Forgelin-1.8.4.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) (foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar)
  AntiCheatCorePlugin ([1.12.2]CatAntiCheat-1.2.6.jar)
  SSLoadingPlugin (静谧四季SereneSeasons-1.12.2-1.2.18-universal.jar)
  IELoadingPlugin (ImmersiveEngineering-core-0.12-92.jar)
  CreativePatchingLoader (图片加载前置CreativeCore_v1.9.87_mc1.12.2.jar)
  TheBetweenlandsLoadingPlugin (TheBetweenlands-3.5.10-core.jar)
  CorePlugin (学园都市AcademyCraft-1.1.2.jar)
  AALoadingPlugin (奥术档案馆arcanearchives-0.2.0.13.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Shall we play a game?
试试按照上面所说先把FoamFix coremod从config中停用吧

====我该怎么回复评分呢？首先排除法，肯定不是连帖。====
楼主说进服务器才粗事，那么我判断为 插 件 冲 突 也不是什么问题吧... 


好吧，是我的错，你们的金粒我就厚颜收下了~

replies.author: TCmc
replies.txt_content:
从单机没事，服务器有事
可以看出是插件问题
和合成台有关的插件config停用一个个测试
我懒得看了
